titles.title: Antitrust Criminal Penalties Enforcement and Reform Act of 2004 Extension Act
A bill to amend subtitle A of the Antitrust Criminal Penalty Enhancement and Reform Act of 2004 to extend the operation of such subtitle for a 1-year period ending June 22, 2010.
Antitrust Criminal Penalties Enforcement and Reform Act of 2004 Extension Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Antitrust Criminal Penalties Enforcement and Reform Act of 2004 Extension Act - Amends the Antitrust Criminal Penalty Enhancement and Reform Act of 2004 to extend through June 22, 2010, provisions of that Act limiting civil damages in antitrust enforcement actions involving conduct covered by antitrust leniency agreements.
